name: playcanvas-webpack
author: PlayCanvas <support@playcanvas.com>
description: Demonstration of building a PlayCanvas app with Webpack

scripts.build-debug: del build-debug/*; NODE_ENV='development' webpack -d --config webpack.conf.js --progress --profile --colors; npm run copy-assets -- 'build-debug'
scripts.build-release: del build-release/*; NODE_ENV='production' webpack -p --config webpack.conf.js --progress --profile --colors; npm run copy-assets -- 'build-release'
